alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 8:31AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist and northwestern St. Charles Parishes through 900 AM CDT... At 831 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgard, or near Reserve, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Killona, Wallace, Montz, Edgard, Norco, Taft and Garyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 203 and 217. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
